title: Compilation of the C API in version 0.10
body_html:
In version 0.10, the C API was moved from tensorflow/core to tensorflow/c. The master branch contains a commit adding a new target to tensorflow/BUILD for building the C API in the new location. However, this commit and the corresponding target are not present on branch r0.10. I’m wondering how one is supposed to build the C API in version 0.10. Thank you.

Regards,
Ivan
body_text:
In version 0.10, the C API was moved from tensorflow/core to tensorflow/c. The master branch contains a commit adding a new target to tensorflow/BUILD for building the C API in the new location. However, this commit and the corresponding target are not present on branch r0.10. I’m wondering how one is supposed to build the C API in version 0.10. Thank you.
Regards,
Ivan
body:
In version 0.10, the C API was [moved](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/788f359b7218ad46696c15459c89688ffe70955e) from `tensorflow/core` to `tensorflow/c`. The master branch contains a [commit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/d03f2545ecc3012e6c941a3a1e957f7d7f8d5040) adding a new target to `tensorflow/BUILD` for building the C API in the new location. However, this commit and the corresponding target are not present on branch `r0.10`. I’m wondering how one is supposed to build the C API in version 0.10. Thank you.

Regards,
Ivan
